book.title: Rackspace Cloud Big Data Release Notes

annotation.remark: Copyright details are filled in by the template.

abstract.para: This document is intended for software developers interested in developing applications using the Rackspace Cloud Big Data Application Program Interface (API).

preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This document describes new features and changes for the Cloud Big Data API.
We welcome feedback, comments, and bug reports at support@rackspacecloud.com.

chapter.title: Document Change History
chapter.para: This version of the release notes replaces and obsoletes all earlier versions. The most recent changes are described in the table below:

chapter.title: January 14, 2014
chapter.para: This release is the initial Limited Availability (LA) release of the Cloud Big Data API.

Rackspace is pleased to announce the Limited Availability release of Rackspace Cloud Big Data. The Limited Access program enables customers and Rackers to test an early version of the product and provide feedback on the product and capabilities. Customers are screened as part of the on-boarding process to ensure correct product/customer fit. The Service Level Agreements (SLAs) for Cloud Big Data is available at http://www.rackspace.com/cloud/legal/sla.

listitem.para: Get started using the Cloud Big Data API with the Cloud Big Data Getting Started Guide at: http://docs.rackspace.com/api/.
Get reference information and examples in the Cloud Big Data Developer Guide at: http://docs.rackspace.com/api/.
Support for Cloud Big Data is available for US and UK customers 24x7x365 via phone, chat, or you may also File a Ticket.
Please visit our Product Feedback Forum and let us know what you think about Cloud Big Data!

chapter.title: September 16, 2013
chapter.para: This release is the initial Early Access (EA) release of the Cloud Big Data API.

Rackspace is pleased to announce the Early Access release of Rackspace Cloud Big Data. The Early Access program enables customers and Rackers, by invitation, to test an early version of the product and provide feedback on the product and its capabilities. The Cloud Big Data Early Access program is a preproduction service offering covered by the Beta Services terms (rackspace.com/information/legal/testterms/) in the Rackspace Cloud Terms of Service.
